channel.title: My Verbal Diarrhea (in Hugo)
channel.description: Recent content on My Verbal Diarrhea (in Hugo)

item.title: On turn based strategy versus RTS
item.description: 1. So recently I’ve been staying home a lot and been playing a lot of games, and came accross this philosophical discussion about strategy, turn based games, and other types of games: - Highlights from this post I liked: 1. In every balanced competitive game, the game is only as difficult as your opponent. The top level Go players have put more time into mastering the game than the top level Starcraft players.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: 1. Today I’ve read a bit from “Working Effectively with Legacy Code” by Michael C. Feathers … and a sentence from that boook, that caught my attention the most was: ‘To me, legacy code is simply code without tests.’ 2. I’m still struggiling with horrific traumatic past events (sampling a few, as per to ‘bury adequately some past traumatic events of mine’ as in vs. ‘shoving them under the rug’):
